      • format

        @NotNull
public java.lang.String format(boolean verbose)

        Returns a fancy formatted String based on this class Timer.

        If verbose is true, expect something like: 1 hour 35 minutes

        If verbose is otherwise false, expect: 01:35:00

        See Also:
        String, class Timer, verbose, verbose
